200.description: Returns bool indicating if the create was okay

400.description: Returns a error message, usually related to wrong bucket id

403.description: User is not allowed to access tenant.

post.summary: Creates new bucket for the tenant

403.description: User is not allowed to access tenant.

post.summary: Move a license from the free bucket to a user bucket

parameters.name: toUserId
parameters.description: The user which should have the free license

200.description: License successfully moved from the free bucket to a user bucket.

400.description: If the license couldn't be moved, it will usually become a bad request

403.description: User is not allowed to access tenant.

post.summary: Move a license from the free bucket to a user bucket

parameters.name: toUserId
parameters.description: The user which should have the free license

parameters.name: fromBucketType
parameters.description: Specify which free bucket to move from. This is usually Auto. User, Tenant and Garbage bucket is not allowed.

requestBody.description: Filter the licenses to be moved

200.description: License successfully moved from the free bucket to a user bucket.

400.description: If the license couldn't be moved, it will usually become a bad request

403.description: User is not allowed to access tenant.

post.summary: Move a license from one bucket type to another. Neither of the bucket types can be a user bucket.

parameters.name: fromBucketType
parameters.description: The bucket type to move the matching license from. Can't be a user bucket

parameters.name: toBucketType
parameters.description: The bucket type to move the matching license to. Can't be a user bucket

200.description: License successfully moved from the free bucket to a user bucket.

400.description: If the license couldn't be moved, it will usually become a bad request

403.description: User is not allowed to access tenant.

post.summary: Move a license from a user to another user

parameters.name: fromUserId
parameters.description: The user to move the license from

parameters.name: toUserId
parameters.description: The user to move the license to

200.description: Bucket transaction history were successfully retrieved.

403.description: User is not allowed to access tenant.

parameters.name: fromBucketId

parameters.name: toBucketId
parameters.description: The bucket to move the license to

200.description: Bucket transaction history were successfully retrieved.

403.description: User is not allowed to access tenant.
